meta.style: raw iPhone indoor realism, no beauty filter, subtle grain, slightly imperfect framing

environment: low platform bed with slightly messy neutral sheets
large flat-screen TV mounted on wall
minimal wooden TV console under TV
abstract framed wall art above the console
second framed print leaning casually against wall
small side table with phone charger and random items
soft area rug with visible texture
clean but lived-in atmosphere, not staged

lighting.effect: soft even light, realistic indoor exposure, gentle shadows under hips and thighs

camera_perspective.pov: self-timer or phone placed low on a surface
camera_perspective.framing: hips and lower back dominant, upper body turned back

subject.vibe: young adult, relaxed confidence, aware but not posing hard

outfit.fit: skin-tight, stretched naturally over hips and thighs

pose.support: one hand planted on floor behind
pose.hips: resting on heels, pushed back toward camera
pose.movement: still frame that feels accidental, not posed
